questions: Where is the Quality Assurance Office?
Where to locate the Quality Assurance Office?
Where to find the Quality Assurance Office?
answers: The Quality Assurance Office is located at the ground floor of the Don Rodolfo T. Lizares, Sr Building also known as the main building. It is facing the colege library and is located along the Human Resource Department. Here's an image of the Quality Assurance Office:
